text: K2-72c is a small exoplanet orbiting around the red dwarf star K2-72 approximately 227.7 light-years away. It is possibly located within the star's habitable zone where conditions are likely to allow the existence of liquid water. K2-72c completes an orbit in 15.2 days, and it has a radius of only 86% of that of the Earth. ==References== Category:Exoplanets discovered in 2016 Category:Transiting exoplanets 72 Category:Aquarius (constellation)
title: K2-72c
